channel.title: Items on death doesn't keep in my invin!
channel.description: I keep the items on death, but it doesn't keep in the invin:S It drops on the floor, but no one can see it! So people have to run back and get there items that they are suppose to keep on death, how do I make it so they keep it in their invin when they die? I am using InsidiaX!

item.title: Items on death doesn't keep in my invin!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Erm I’m not sure whether that’s a PI source or not but here’s a few bits that I just pulled out of a PI source that might help.

                                        c.getItems().dropAllItemsPVP();
					if(!c.isSkulled) {	
						for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++) {
							if(c.itemKeptId[i1] > 0) {
								c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[i1], 1);
							}
						}
					}
					if(c.prayerActive[10]) { 
						if(c.itemKeptId[3] > 0) {
							c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[3], 1);
						}
					}
				}

Guess the first one is the main priority if you want all the items to be kept on death?

Read full topic
item.source: Items on death doesn't keep in my invin!

item.title: Items on death doesn't keep in my invin!
item.dc:creator: @K0y K0y
item.description:
@K0y wrote:

The Applydead method is quite extensive, you’re better off just using a new source. (InsidiaX is shit).

Read full topic
